dcterms:creator: C. Veaux
J. Yamagishi
S. King
dcterms:description: The Voice Bank–DEMAND dataset consists of utterances recorded by 30 speakers, with 28 used for training and 2 for testing. Noisy mixtures were synthesized using various types of noise at different SNR levels.
dcterms:title: Voice Bank–DEMAND dataset

dcterms:creator: J. Thiemann
N. Ito
E. Vincent
dcterms:description: The DEMAND dataset is a collection of multi-channel recordings of acoustic noise in diverse environments, used for evaluating speech enhancement systems.
dcterms:title: Voice Bank–DEMAND dataset
